file.name: error_domain_v1.1.0.yaml
file.content:
# OpenAPI version identifier - required for OpenAPI 3.0 domains
openapi: 3.0.3

#######################
# Optional info section
#######################
info:
  title: DCSA Error Domain
  description: |
    Common error components for DCSA APIs. Components here are used by all DCSA APIs and Domains.

    For a history of changes in this domain - please check [GitHub](https://github.com/dcsaorg/DCSA-OpenAPI/tree/master/domain/error). Please also [create a GitHub issue](https://github.com/dcsaorg/DCSA-OpenAPI/issues/new) if you have any questions/comments.
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  contact:
    name: Digital Container Shipping Association (DCSA)
    url: https://dcsa.org
    email: info@dcsa.org
  version: 1.1.0

components:
  schemas:
    detailedError:
      type: object
      properties:
        errorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          description: |
            Standard error code see http://dcsa.org/error-codes (to be created). Examples: 7003 â€“ out or range value, 7004 -  invalid type
          minimum: 7000
          maximum: 7999
          example: 7003
        field:
          type: string
          maxLength: 50
          description: |
            The field that caused the error, e.g. a failed validation
          example: facilityCode
        value:
          type: string
          maxLength: 500
          description: |
            The value that of the field that caused the error
          example: SG SIN WHS
        reason:
          description: |
            High level error message
          type: string
          maxLength: 100
          example: 'invalidQuery'
        message:
          type: string
          maxLength: 200
          description: |
            Additional information as to why the error occured
          example: 'Spaces not allowed in facility code'
      required:
        - reason
        - message
    error:
      type: object
      properties:
        httpMethod:
          description: |
            The http request method type e.g. GET, POST
          type: string
          example: 'POST'
          enum:
            - GET
            - HEAD
            - POST
            - PUT
            - DELETE
            - OPTION
            - PATCH
        requestUri:
          description: |
            The request URI as it was sent
          type: string
          format: uri
          example: 'https://dcsa.org/dcsa/tnt/v1/events'
        statusCode:
          description: |
            The HTTP status code
          type: integer
          format: int32
          example: 400
        statusCodeText:
          description: |
            The textual representation of the status code
          type: string
          maxLength: 50
          example: 'Bad Request'
        errorMessage:
          description: |
            Other error information
          type: string
          maxLength: 200
          example: 'The supplied data could not be accepted'
        providerCorrelationID:
          description: |
            A unique identifier for the transaction, e.g. a UUID
          type: string
          maxLength: 100
          example: '4426d965-0dd8-4005-8c63-dc68b01c4962'
        errorDateTime:
          description: |
            The date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the error occurred.
          type: string
          format: date-time
          example: '2019-11-12T07:41:00+08:30'
        errors:
          type: array
          description: |
            List of detailed errors, e.g. fields that could not pass validation
          minItems: 1
          items:
            allOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/detailedError'
      required:
        - httpMethod
        - requestUri
        - statusCode
        - statusCodeText
        - errorDateTime
        - errors
